alert.note: Alert for Erie (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 21 at 9:21PM EDT until August 21 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1000 PM EDT FOR CENTRAL ERIE COUNTY... At 920 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Erie, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Erie, North East, Wattsburg, Northwest Harborcreek, Harborcreek, Lawrence Park, Wesleyville, McKean and Northwest Harborcr. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
